comment.var: DISPLAY SHIP INFORMATION --by-- MISTER BEAR v1.60 Jan-2011
Display detailed information about a specified ship

comment.var: ************** DISPLAY PASSENGERS AND CARGO PROGRESS BAR ***************
Add passenger volume to cargo volume running total. calculate value of passengers as slaves.

comment.var: Handle options to display missing info or exit
GET ESCORT LEADER : If ship is part of a convoy, retrieve the leading ship
DISPLAY ESCORT VESSEL : Creates and displays list items for the escort ships list box
PARAM : xSubResult -- Escort leader (from previous call to 'getEscortLeader'
Highlight the escort vessel who's details are being displayed in the dialog

line.text: add custom menu item to array

comment.var: DISPLAY LANDED VESSEL : Creates and displays list items for the landed ships list box

line.text: add custom menu item to array

comment.var: FORMAT VESSEL PROPERTIES : Used by the two subs above, it lists a vessels weapon/shield strength, name and object class.
Object Class (or dash for anything else)
